Text.Value: Is there anything I can do to gain an advantage over Gortash?
How did you come to be tadpoled?
Leave.
At least... he got... to live.
Owed... money... to dangerous... people...
Why did you sell your son into slavery?
Dreadful child... sold him to a warlock... to save our shop...
Enver... got his... revenge...
Sabotage... his traps...
It was... the only thing... we could do...
I killed your son.
Wanted us... to feel... what he felt. Powerless...
What can you tell me about your son?
He's... very... crafty...
Sally... Flymm... mother of... Enver. Flymm... Gortash...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Start with the big... metal... freaks...
Who are you?
I should have ended him... in the womb...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
So... it's finished. Good...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
Someone... already got... his Watchers...

Synopsis: Speak With Dead dialogue for Gortash's mother, Sally Flymm. Gortash tadpoled his parents, who sold him into slavery in his youth. They were aware of their state but cannot resist the tadpole's compulsion - which made them appear to be huge fans of their son. When they die, the tadpole loses its grip over them.
